nodes.text: The Naboo Herald was a news publication published on Naboo at the time of the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY Ista Kezever published the article "Galaxy in Review ... Intergalactic Report 12.1" about changes in politics and technology in the in the Naboo Herald.

When the developers of the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies released the Publish 12.1 update in January 2005, a loading screen styled as a news article written by "Ista Kezever reporting for the Naboo Herald" was shown to all players of the game, describing various changes to the game in an in-universe style.
